name: Export Posts to CSV
author: Satya Prakash

sections.description:
Allows exporting post data into CSV format with filter options on the post dashboard screen.

Features

  • Export posts data.
  • Export posts data based on status.
  • Export posts data based on category.
  • Export posts data based on date.

Usage

After activating the plugin, you can export post data via the post dashboard screen.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the export-posts-to-csv plugin to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
sections.faq:
Can I select specific dates from the dropdown?

Yes, you can select specific dates month-wise.

Where can I get support for this plugin?

For support, please visit the plugin support forum on WordPress.org.
